idea-plugin.name: TUM Exam Mode
idea-plugin.description:
Unofficial TUM Exam Integrity Plugin

Developed by Sriyash Kommalapati.


Enforces strict exam regulations by automatically disabling 25+ known AI tools:

  • JetBrains AI: Full Line Code Completion, AI Assistant, Junie, Turbo Complete
  • External AI: GitHub Copilot, Tabnine, Codeium, Amazon Q, Bito, Blackbox
  • Core Features: Inline "Ghost Text" Suggestions, ML Sorting

⚠️ USER RESPONSIBILITY: This plugin targets the most common AI assistants. If you have installed obscure or personal AI plugins not listed here, you are responsible for disabling them manually.


DISCLAIMER: This is a private project and is NOT officially endorsed or supported by the Technical University of Munich (TUM). The user assumes full responsibility for its usage.
